column3: “Amazing strain, very clear minded and so so tasty. Let's open a MN in Vegas!”

“I just picked up what the clinic classified as ridge berry. Luckily this strain is on leafly. I hope this is not boogjie ridge berry that im smoking on. If its not which ill give benefit of the doubt pretty clean high nice satuva effect smelly tasty bud. love the high at night i smoked it first at night so i have no other chouce but to like it like my daddy told me”
